metadata.Title: CVE-2022-36648 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The hardware emulation in the of_dpa_cmd_add_l2_flood of rocker device model in QEMU, as used in 7.0.0 and earlier, allows remote attackers to crash the host qemu and potentially execute code on the host via execute a malformed program in the guest OS.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> As of 2023-10-12, patch is not commited to upstream

criterions.comment: qemu: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
